name: Mumble-thumbnailer
tagline: Produce thumbnails for links in mumble text chat.
body:
# mumble-thumbnailer

Bot that sits around and thumbnails your image links for mumble's text chat. Why? Because it's annoying doing it yourself.

### Sample

Demonstration video [here](https://github.com/Battleroid/mumble-thumbnailer/raw/master/sample.webm).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
